Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored a last-second goal to rescue a draw for England

Post-Match Reflections: Jude Bellingham praised the team's fighting spirit
Gareth Southgate defended his decision to pick John Stones despite his injury

Others: England wanted to impose themselves as an attacking force after their 1-0 defeat against Brazil
